Text: How do you get the subtitles?

to burn:
just download a program like ImgBurn
burn the whole folder 'Ponyo on the Cliff NTSC' to dvd disc
then you're done, put it in your dvd player and it works.
(this procedure works in general for all those folders with the Video_TS and VTS_01 sorts of files, makes nice product too, in an easy way)
